dsOverview.title: NOAA WDCA Magnetic Indices and Sunspots, 1932-1981Jun

summary.p: This dataset contains basic solar data received from World Data Center A and includes sunspot indices and sunspot number. Data are available from January 1932 to June 1981.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NGDC > National Geophysical Data Center, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Solid Earth > Geomagnetism > Geomagnetic Indices
EARTH SCIENCE > Sun-earth Interactions > Solar Activity > Sunspots
